summary: Based on a true story dating back to 1985 when two Polish boys, a teenager and his little brother, escaped from communist Poland all the way to Sweden, hidden under a truck. In the movie, their destination has been changed to Denmark.
cast: Wojciech Klata|Rafal Zimowski|Kama Kowalewska|Jadwiga Jankowska-Cieslak|Andrzej Mellin|Adrianna Biedrzynska|Aleksander Bednarz|Krzysztof Stroinski|Hans Christian Ægidius|Wieslaw Komasa|Ryszard Mróz|Henryk Niebudek|Jerzy Schejbal|Peter Steen|Holger Vistisen|Barbara Dzido-Lelinska|Malgorzata Rozniatowska|Katarzyna Pawlak|Wojciech Biedron|Stanislaw Jaskulka|Wojciech Nowak|Marek Pietrak|Tadeusz Teodorczyk|Oskar Kaminscy|Tomek Kaminscy|Ania Dejczer|Edward Warwas
keywords: bird of prey|teenage boy|young boy|boy running|binoculars
title: 300 mil do nieba
